quotes.quote: It's harder to get hard when you're old.
That's bad ass. Wait, shouldn't it be good ass?
Wait, we're crossing here? Isn't this dangerous? And illegal? I don't want to die
quotes.situation: Nick Ng on crossing the street

quotes.quote: Oh my god! It's Jamie Beaton!
quotes.situation: Nick Ng on reading an email by Jamie Beaton

quotes.quote: Goats and sheep aren't the same species. I've unsuccessfully tried to mate them for years on my dad's farm.
quotes.situation: Nick Ng on the Chinese zodiac

quotes.fact: Nick and his girlfriend met through their parents.
Nick last played World of Warcraft in 2013.

quotes.quote: You should tell your girlfriend to visit the train museum.
quotes.situation: Nick Ng on recommending where to go in Japan

quotes.quote:
Jacky: Nick, say a random thing.
Nick: Limp dick?
Is it just you and David at the Queen Street office?

quotes.fact: Nick wanted to be a locksmith when he was in highschool.
